definitions.definition: Any of several fibrous mineral forms of magnesium silicate , used for fireproofing , electrical insulation, building materials, brake linings, chemical filters, suits, fireman's gloves, etc.
examples: All types of asbestos are potentially carcinogenic when inhaled.

definitions.definition: Any of asbestos-like forms of several minerals, asbestiforms
The supposed material composing part of the body that is impervious to heat , or by extension other unpleasant sensations ; especially hot or spicy food.
